content: faith by rose williams simple as abc this is a simple design that can show off any gradient yarn 250 yards aran weight yarn sample shown used 1 ball juniper moon cumulus #11 16 circular needles you can change to a longer cable when stitches increase 1 stitch marker gauge 14 sts / 24 row = 4 stockinette size top edge 23 bottom edge 27 height 15 abbreviations k = knit yo = yarn over slkwyb = slip one stitch knitwise with yarn in back psso2 = pass the slipped stitch over 2 knitted stitches m1r = make one right pick up the bar below place on left needle back to front and knit in the front of the stitch cast on 80 stitches using your favorite cast on join to knit in the round being careful not to twist place marker k 11 rounds increase k10 m1r 8 times = 88sts 1 s1kwyb k2 psso2 yo k1 repeat to end of round 2 k to end of round 3 k1 s1kwyb k2 psso2 yo repeat to end of round 4 - 14 k all rounds increase k11 m1r 8 times = 96sts repeat rounds 1 14 increase k12 m1r 8 times = 104sts repeat rounds 1 1 4 increase k13 m1r 8 times = 112sts repeat rounds 1 14 you can knit a few more rounds if you want to use up all your yarn bind off loosely or use your favorite stretchy bind off top and bottom edges are designed to roll so if you want yours to roll allow them to roll when blocking
